出道10週年紀念數位單曲

BBIBBI(삐삐)
https://youtu.be/nM0xDI5R50E

FortMarcy71 巴打睇完 BBI BBI 歌詞有感而發向娘娘致敬既一首詩

其實隻歌主要係警告啲偶像狂飯，唔好玩到咁癲，八卦到變實質滋擾；頭先寫詩嗰陣，基本就係用咗月宮、嫦娥嗰啲做題材去講呢個意思：

《窺‧禁》 - FortMarcy71

莫道廣寒風物好，天梯妄接造宮門。穿窬未見姮娥殿，先墜九原作斷垣。

注釋：
1. 廣寒 -> 廣寒宮，即係月亮
2. 造 -> 粵音「醋」，即係「前往」咁解
3. 穿窬 -> 窬，即係牆。穿窬意指爬牆潛入嗰類行為
4. 姮娥 -> 嫦娥嘅原體字。漢文帝叫「劉恆」，為咗避諱，由嗰時開始改叫「嫦娥」
5. 九原 -> 地府
6. 斷垣 -> 垣，即係矮牆、牆腳；斷垣即係爛茸茸殘缺不全嘅牆腳

成首詩其實大致即係歌詞嗰種意思：貪過癮太八卦做狂飯，分分鐘乜嘢得著都無就已經PK。

************************************************************************************************************

李知恩（韓語：이지은，英語：Lee Ji-Eun，1993年5月16日－），韓國女歌手，出生於韓國京畿道廣州市。音樂類型以節奏藍調、民謠、民謠搖滾為主，風格以抒情為主。於2008年9月18日的Mnet《M！Countdown》節目出道。2009年，重新以藝名IU出發。

藝名：IU（아이유）
本名：李知恩（이지은）Yi Ji Eun
出生日期：1993年5月16日
身高：161.8cm
血型：A型
星座：金牛座
興趣：讀書、唱歌、跳舞
特長：吉他、唱歌
喜歡的食物：生魚片、mattang
喜歡的演員：姜志奐、鄭在泳、韓智敏
喜歡的音樂家：金泰宇、Gummy、TAMIA
圈中好友：Luna f(x)、 朴智妍（T-ara）、劉仁娜
理想型：太陽（BIGBANG）、童顏，有幽默感，認真時認真（於英雄豪傑中所說）
經紀公司：FAVE Entertainment
曲風：R&B、POP BALLDE、SOUL、SOFT ROCK
學校：首爾同德女子高中
官方粉絲名稱：Uaena

出道至今所有專輯及主打歌

IU 出道六周年大米應援


感謝已集資大米應援偽飯

1.Blanc_1664, 2.上高登的理由, 3.noeYiJiEun, 4.哎呦
5.HaUae-da, 6.恩恩向榮, 7.粉熊的夙願, 8.好樣
9.用花整書籤, 10.摩登時代, 11.輕本皆人, 12.伯母是無罪的
13.頑皮, 14.傻更更曬你冷
一個屬於高登 Uaena 與 IU 既美好回憶...
9月15日見！

I saw her live at Yokohama Stadium which was marvelous and unforgettable. She's been strutting her stuff since she was a child so don't sell her short. At the end of the last encore she bowed onstage soaking up the applause. She was given a standing ovation and thunderous applause. The singer and the dancers and acrobats who were invited to perform with her gave a magnificent performance. The choreography, the stage design and lighting design and the light sticks were superb and surpassed our expectations. Yesterday I assigned six and a half hours for practicing her songs on my cor anglais (English horn), clarinet, E-flat clarinet, bass clarinet, bassoon and contrabassoon. I practised with my friends who played triangle, tambourine, castanets, sleigh bells (jingle bells), gongs, snare drums, cymbals (hi-hat, clash and ride) and bass drum, all of which have indefinite pitch. Adding these instruments makes the music more rhythmic. Saxophone, cor anglais and clarinet are transposing instruments. Saxophone, clarinet and bass clarinet are single reed instrument whereas oboe, cor anglais, bassoon and contrabassoon are double reed instruments. Flute is a reedless instrument. My friend Paul is an euphonium player. He explained to us regarding a piece by muzio clementi "this passage should be played beautifully rather than rhythmically. Otherwise it's a bit cheap." I saw lots of his pencil marks on the score such as: cantabile, silence, no pause here, just separate, clean pedal, more melodic voicing, remain soft, stay soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time....Regarding teaching he said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay monthly or for four lessons at a time. For this month you can pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis because maybe you wanna see what it's like to have lessons. From next month onwards pay monthly. Students of all standards are welcome. I'm also an accompanist who accompanies singers, instrumentalists and other performers for exams, auditions and live performances. I have some adult students who started learning the piano when they were eighteen. Their fingers are less flexible and dextrous and slower than say a ten year old boy. So start training your fingers when you're still very young. In this way you're gonna be able to get much faster fingers. It'll improve your finger speed, dexterity, strength and accuracy to a large extent." He asked me to get him some Ravel scores as I can get them on the cheap from a friend of mine. Besides being an incredible musician she's also an avid runner. She took part in a three thousand metre race where she came second. She rose to the occasion, ran for all she was worth and dived over the finish line passing the runner who was ahead of her earlier. Loads of fans congratulated her on having won the race as she held the trophy up. The race.was the opportunity for all the best female runners in Kyoto to strut their stuff. It was truly memorable.
